com.cscguru.client.entities

Class PlayerInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cscguru.client.entities.PlayerInfo

  • public class PlayerInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the information that pertains to a player such as the player's health, mana, stamina, damage, armor, and more.
    Author:
    Bryan Bennett

    • Constructor Summary

      Initializes an instance of PlayerInfo based on the information passed in.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeGold(int gold)
      Changes the player's gold count based on the positivity or negativity of the value passed in.

      Changes the hit points based on the positivity or negativity of the passed in value.

      int getArmor()
      Returns the player's armor value.
      int getDamage()
      Randomizes the damage by generating a number between (inclusively) the player's minimum and maximum damage and returns that number.
      float getDmgReduct()
      Returns the damage reduction benefit based on the player's armor value and current level.

      Returns the amount of gold the player has.

      • changeHP

        public void changeHP(float hp)
        Changes the hit points based on the positivity or negativity of the passed in value. Will not allow the hit points to fall below zero or exceed the maximum hit point value.
        Parameters:
        hp -

      • changeXp

        public void changeXp(float xp)
        Changes the player's current experience passed on the positivity or negativity of the value passed in. Also handles the leveling up of the player if the current experience exceeds the maximum experience and sets the new maximum experience along with the new level up stats.
        Parameters:
        xp -
